activities:
Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:
CONTROL DATA, INC WILL NOT disclose the personal data collected through its ProcurePort website or through the ProcurePort software to third parties with the exception of the disclosure that is required to perform ProcurePort Client services. This allowed disclosure includes the submittal of data to Event sponsors about the participating bidders and their bids. By taking part in ProcurePort Events, bidders understand that their information will be supplied to buyers and/or Event sponsors.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
Dispute Resolution:  
Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs) or their authorized representatives, as well as the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
